name: Firelit
description:
Enjoy the product of 6 months of work from a complete beginner. Avoid traps, shoot your weapons, kill any enemies you meet, including bosses. All of this in a retro, arcade-like, pixel art style.

Custom sprites, SFX, music, gameplay. 

Controls:

WASDMovementMouse cursorAimAlpha1,Alpha2,Alpha3Weapon switchEscapePause menuLeft mouse buttonShootRReload
